Question
========

The following cross tabulation includes data from 120 individuals for two variables, with possible outcomes A, B, and C, I and II, respectively.

  ---- ---- ---- ---- A B C I 20 32 28 II 7 18 15 ---- ---- ---- ----

We randomly draw someone from the 120 people. For this person, P(B \| II) is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0.4
* 0.36
* 0.15
* 0.45

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.4: Incorrect
* 0.36: Incorrect
* 0.15: Incorrect
* 0.45: Correct
